title: JSON CSV Table Schema Specification
description: CSV Table Schema Specification v-0.0.x based on JSON Schema

version.description: The version of the CSV schema.

title.description: The title of the CSV schema.

description.description: A short description of the CSV schema.

name.description: The name of the CSV table.

description.description: A short description of the CSV table.

type.description: Supported table types: `ordered` (columns must appear in defined order), `unordered` (columns can appear in any order) and `headless` (no header row present)

additionalColumns.description: A boolean that specifies whether additional columns are allowed.

anyOf.description: This is a string type column.

name.description: The name of the CSV column.

description.description: A short description of the CSV column.

type.description: The type keyword of the CSV column.

format.description: Supported formats for this type: `none` (any value), `uuid` (https://datatracker.ietf.org/doc/html/rfc3986), `uri` (https://datatracker.ietf.org/doc/html/rfc4122), `email` (https://datatracker.ietf.org/doc/html/rfc5322#section-3.4.1) and `base64` (https://datatracker.ietf.org/doc/html/rfc4648).

minLength.description: An integer that specifies the minimum character length of the value.

maxLength.description: An integer that specifies the maximum character length of the value.

nullable.description: A boolean that specifies whether the value can be empty.

optional.description: A boolean that specifies whether the column can be omitted. See remarks for headless tables in documentation.

pattern.description: A string that specifies a regular expression that must mach against each value.

anyOf.description: This is an enumeration type column.

name.description: The name of the CSV column.

description.description: A short description of the CSV column.

type.description: The type keyword of the CSV column.

members.description: The list of allowed values for this enumeration.

description.description: A short description of the value.

nullable.description: A boolean that specifies whether the value can be empty.

optional.description: A boolean that specifies whether the column can be omitted. See remarks for headless tables in documentation.

pattern.description: A string that specifies a regular expression that must mach against each value.

anyOf.description: This is an enumeration set type column. The set of values is formatted as csv string.

description.description: A short description of the CSV column.
